title: ClientSettings
description:
Basic client behavior settings. These settings specify the various targets and behavior of the Bitwarden Client. They are optional and uneditable once the client is initialized.

Defaults to

``` # use bitwarden::sdk::request::client_settings::{ClientSettings, DeviceType}; # use assert_matches::assert_matches; let settings = ClientSettings { identity_url: "https://identity.bitwarden.com".to_string(), api_url: "https://api.bitwarden.com".to_string(), user_agent: "Bitwarden Rust-SDK".to_string(), device_type: DeviceType::SDK, internal: None, }; let default = ClientSettings::default(); assert_matches!(settings, default); ```

Targets `localhost:8080` for debug builds.

apiUrl.description: The api url of the targeted Bitwarden instance. Defaults to `https://api.bitwarden.com`

deviceType.description: Device type to send to Bitwarden. Defaults to SDK

identityUrl.description: The identity url of the targeted Bitwarden instance. Defaults to `https://identity.bitwarden.com`

userAgent.description: The user_agent to sent to Bitwarden. Defaults to `Bitwarden Rust-SDK`
